body_html: Windows support is a bit of a dramatic effort. Maybe supporting Windows only for a truly standard compiler (gcc / tdm-gcc / mingwpy) and on a modern Python (3.4?) would be a much more easy target ?
body_text: Windows support is a bit of a dramatic effort. Maybe supporting Windows only for a truly standard compiler (gcc / tdm-gcc / mingwpy) and on a modern Python (3.4?) would be a much more easy target ?
body: Windows support is a bit of a dramatic effort. Maybe supporting Windows only for a truly standard compiler (gcc / tdm-gcc / mingwpy) and on a modern Python (3.4?) would be a much more easy target ?
